column1: Smoque BBQ////Our order was placed and I had the brisket....something I dearly miss from Texas and have struggled to find a place that does it as well as places like Salt Lick in Austin in the Mid-west.  It was a brisket platter I ordered which comes with cole slaw and 2 sides.  My sides were baked beans and fries.  By the time we had our order taken and paid we had a table to sit in.  We waited for between 10 and 15 minutes which wasn't that long
column2: but felt longer with all the folks around us eating
column3: plus the smell of the food cooking?!?!?!
